who i am and what i can do

bio

I am a self-taught web developer working with a variety of technologies in both front end and back. I Studied Computer Games Development at the University of Westminster, and have graduated with Honours. Since then I have worked in a variety of roles allowing me to sharpen key skills that are necessary for a successful career as a web developer. My projects can be found below.

A hobby of mine has been experimenting with photography. You can find my gallery showcasing some of my latest pictures here.
